dialogue.text: Savory? Hmm, doesn't ring a bell...
That's cause he's before your time. I've read up on him a whole lot, though, so strap in, viewers.
He was insanely popular in his region of Corianda over 20 years ago. The absolute heartthrob of the Latin Rock scene with his suave voice and finesse with the guitar.
He was a lone wolf for a while, but his life would change unexpectedly. At the height of his career, he had a surprise performance alongside a talented young lady he had never met.
That surprise duet sparked something between the two of them, and they quickly became passionate lovers.
Aww, that sounds so sweet! Reminds me a lot of how Sweet and Sour met.
...and that's where the good stuff ends.
One string of bad decisions after another, and his time in the spotlight was over as fast as it had started.
And in turn, he lost his precious love as well.
Aww, no... What happened to him after that?
Savory basically vanished after his career died. Nobody had seen him since.
...at least, that's what most people THINK happened. I have a theory, though.
C'mon now, Syn, not another crazy conspiracy.
Please, hear me out on this one.
Not long after Savory's disappearance, this masked man began to pop up all around Corianda, helping lost travelers stuck in Corianda's labyrinth of pathways.
The tourists and locals call him 'The Wayfinder'. People keep saying they don't know his true identity, but c'mon now! That's gotta be Savory!
I'm... not gonna jump to conclusions like that.
If it ends up being true, though, you know where you heard it first, viewers. This guy right here!
I will admit, this Wayfinder guy does have that similar suave look, and the timing is a little sus...
Heh, funny thing about that suaveness... According to his ex, most of it is just show. He's a wild, overdramatic klutz offstage.
Hey, I told you not to look at those gross gossip sites for info!
You know I can't help it, Sunny.
